content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Greetings, Ryanah. Thank you for considering my apartment for rent. As a landlord, my goal is to maximize my gains from renting out this 25-square-meter space. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What is your proposed price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. Therefore, I am willing to negotiate with you.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I see. Negotiations can be a productive way to reach an agreement that benefits both parties. Can you provide me with your specific budget for renting this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 500 Euros per month.

I am willing to negotiate with you, but I am also dependable and responsible. I want to make sure that the apartment is well maintained and that I pay my rent on time.

I also want to be on good terms with my landlord. Therefore, I am open to discussing any terms and conditions that you believe are necessary to ensure that both parties are satisfied.

I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for your flexibility, Ryanah. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and your commitment to being a responsible tenant. Based on our discussion, I am willing to accept a rental price of 600 Euros per month. This price takes into account the size of the apartment and the market rates in Mannheim.

In return, I expect you to maintain the apartment in good condition and pay your rent on time. If there are any issues or concerns that arise during your tenancy, I encourage you to bring them to my attention so that we can work together to find a solution.

I believe that this agreement will work for both of us, and I look forward to having you as my tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine
